name: meowder
description:
You are a detective who saw the scene, you need to find the connection between things, recorded with the camera, and associated with photos.

What is the truth behind a series of chain reactions?

Control:

WASD move around, mouse to look around, left click to take pictures under camera mode

F - Enter and exit camera mode

G - Enter and exit the photo gallery

First, click the slot you want to put a picture in and then click image.

To delete pictures, click thumbnail and click delete

R - Restart

Esc - Close the game
